snippet: A California appeals court shot down Donald Sterling’s latest effort to block the $2 billion sale of the Los Angeles Clippers to the former Microsoft chief executive Steve Ballmer.
abstract: California appeals court shoots down Donald Sterling's latest effort to block $2 billion sale of Los Angeles Clippers to former Microsoft chief executive Steve Ballmer.
lead_paragraph: A California appeals court shot down Donald Sterling’s latest effort to block the $2 billion sale of the Los Angeles Clippers to the former Microsoft chief executive Steve Ballmer.
